SEARCH
Package gridgames

Interface GameListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConsoleView, FileManager, GraphicalView, SoundPlayer
public interface GameListener
Interface that a class must implement to be able to be a listener of a Game object.

GameListener objects can be attached to a Game instance with the method Game.addListener(GameListener). Added listeners are able to receive notifications for various types of events happening during the game, through the Game instance itself. The types of events are described in the EventType enumeration.

Events are generated by the Game instance through its methods, that are likeley to be called by other classes interacting with the Game. These classes may be other GameListener subtypes.

NOTE: GameListener instances are "Views" of the Model-View-Controller pattern used to design this project.

See Also:
  • Game
  • EventType

  • Method Details

    • update

      void update(GameEvent event)
      Updates this GameListener according to a given GameEvent.

      This method is most likely to be called by a Game instance.

      Parameters:
      event - Event to react on, as a GameEvent object.
      See Also:
      • GameEvent

    • setGame

      void setGame(Game game)
      Sets the Game instance to read information on.

      Listeners may need to be aware of the state of a Game object to update themselves properly, e.g. if it is a graphical user interface or a terminal user interface displaying a Game.

      Parameters:
      game - The Game instance to read information on.
      See Also:
      • Game

    • setController

      void setController(GameController controller)
      Sets the GameController to interact with.

      Listeners may be the support of components the user can interact with to control a Game object, e.g. a graphical user interface using buttons. These components are provided by the GameController object.

      Parameters:
      controller - The GameController instance whose methods can be called to interact with the user.
      See Also:
      • GameController
